Texts.Chs: 后来她看着我，发出嘶嘶的声音，好像她不再把我当成自己人了。
Texts.Eng: Afterwards she looked at me and hissed, as if she no longer recognised me as one of her own.

Texts.Chs: 在食堂里，我避开我的亲人，选择一个人吃饭。这肉尝起来又臭又脏。我希望我能尽快调走。
Texts.Eng: In the mess hall, I avoid my kin and choose to eat alone. The meat tastes rank and soiled. I hope I'm transferred soon.

Texts.Chs: 重读我以前的日记，我变得惊慌，然后害怕。记忆变得越来越模糊，就好像有一块冰冷而坚硬的木头在我的大脑中打结，牵引着我的思绪。今天我接受了第三次干树汁治疗。医生不得不强行把针扎进去。
Texts.Eng: Upon re-reading my previous journal entry, I became alarmed and then afraid. Memories are growing hazy, as if there's a cold, hard knot of wood in my brain, tugging at my thoughts. I had my third Drysap treatment today. The doctor had to force the needle in.
